email.subject: Welcome login to %{project} ConfOps
email.body:
Hello %{user}

Thank you for participating in %{project}. Please click this link to log in to the system, and note that this link is only valid for 15 minutes.

Best regards,
ConfOps
%{email_from}

login.failed: Login failed. Please check your email.
